issue.title: methstreams.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://methstreams.com/index17/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmethstreams.com%2Findex17%2F) ### Comment > I often use the page methstreams.com to watch the WWE and PPV events. Whenever I tap the start/play video icon it opens another tab to another page. I close the tab and try again which actually works and plays the video but after some time if i touch anywhere on the screen it will pop up the other page again. Username: `@SeisZero` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5oc8cm1zhrk8sks0s8k00gwcg8848cg6dzh0879f0w.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.5 System version: | IOS 18 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `Adguard DNS (DNS-over-HTTPS)`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:

AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
Adblock Warning Removal List,
Fanboy's Annoyances Other extensions used: | Only Adguard

issue.title: football.fantasysports.yahoo.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://football.fantasysports.yahoo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffootball.fantasysports.yahoo.com%2F) ### Comment > Any time I click on the “view all” of “transaction trends”, the yahoo fantasy sports app immediately crashes. > > This just started happening with the new version 11.6.0 of the app. > > If I disable dns or use a different dns server, the app works and has an ad at the top of the page. Username: `@matthewjmiller1` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jx8gcea1gfkss0owkggogk4ow4ocg8sq6e2awt6apc.jpg?nc=1)

### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.5 System version: | IOS 18.0.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://adguard-dns.io`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Other:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
It is pubads.g.doubleclick.net being blocked that is causing the app to crash. If I use the non-filtering AdGuard DNS server, it works unless I locally block that one domain (as shown below) which causes the app to always crash. If I unblock it, the app doesn’t crash. 

![IMG_9425](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b955fbc7-ab85-421f-a274-0a78259c1859)
